meaningMnemonic: Add a <radical>drop</radical> of something magical to <radical>water</radical> and suddenly it turns into big block of <kanji>ice</kanji>, just like that.
readingMnemonic: When you think of <kanji>ice</kanji>, I want you to think of someone frozen with ice. Do you know anyone named <reading>Corey</reading> (こおり)? Anyone famous named Corey, perhaps Corey Feldman? Imagine this Corey person frozen solid with ice.
